name: Crash Site
description: You see your crashed ship with obvious signs of damage. You'll need to find tools to fix them. You take a look around and see paths to the North, East and South. Moving on this planet will drain your HP!

name: Frozen Tundra
description: Temperatures quickly dropped and now you're in the middle of a frozen tundra wasteland.  You don't see much around you except a barely visible path to the west

name: Crater
description: You fall into a large, but shallow crater.  You notice some plastic crates with some Tools sticking out.  Maybe you can fix your ship with it.  You also see some vegetation starting to grow south of the crater

name: Jungle
description: All you see is a densely packed jungle with lots of trees everywhere.  On a tree branch you spot a fruit that you can eat.  Hopefully it's not too poisonous. Doesn't seem like there's anywhere else to go but back

name: Beach
description: Looks like a very nice deserted beach.  You could picture yourself vacationing here if you hadn't crash landed and trying to fight to survive.  You do see a fish that washed up on shore though, maybe you can eat it. You also spot a small creek emptying out into the beach to the south.

name: Creek
description: Just a small freshwater creek here going up the mountain to the west.  The mountain looks pretty inaccessible from here though.  Maybe you can go around it.

name: Mountains
description: Looks like a pretty tall mountain with a path to the top.  You can vaguely spot something like a radio antenna at the top.  What could that be?

name: Alien Compound
description: Remote alien compound.  That was a close one!

name: Far East Crater
description: A deep dark and cold crater...untouched

name: Abandoned Storage Facility
description: A storage facility...on the Dark side of the?

name: Lava Tubes
description: Lava caves formed from a continuous flow of Lava

name: Abandoned Ship
description: The lost ship from the 2022 mission! Could it be?

name: South Crater
description: Another deep dark crater full of footprints

name: Landing Site
description: A planet similar to Earth's Moon

name: Dead Volcano
description: A volcano that appears to have been dormant for some time
